mapper.update: update user_table set identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel_number = #{telNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_img = #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u.id,u.identity_id, i.identity_name, u.major, u.user_name, u.pwd, u.`name`, u.sex, u.age, u.tel_number, u.grade, u.user_img, a.id as association_id ,a.association_name, ua.job,d.id as department_id,d.department_name from user_table u left join `identity_table` i on i.id = u.identity_id left join user_activity_table ua on u.id = ua.user_id left join association_table a on a.id = ua.association_id left join department_table d on d.association_id = a.id where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select u.id,u.identity_id, i.identity_name, u.major, u.user_name, u.pwd, u.`name`, u.sex, u.age, u.tel_number, u.grade, u.user_img, a.id as association_id ,a.association_name, ua.job,d.id as department_id,d.department_name from user_table u left join `identity_table` i on i.id = u.identity_id left join user_activity_table ua on u.id = ua.user_id left join association_table a on a.id = ua.association_id left join department_table d on d.association_id = a.id where u.user_name = #{userName} and u.pwd = #{pwd}
